item.name: Mozzarella Pizza
item.description: Savor the simplicity and elegance of our Mozzarella Pizza—a true classic that highlights the finest ingredients. Featuring a perfectly baked, golden crust topped with a rich, savory tomato sauce and a generous layer of creamy, melt-in-your-mouth mozzarella cheese, this pizza is the epitome of comfort food.

item.name: Potato Pizza
item.description: Discover a new favorite with our Potato Pizza, where comfort food meets gourmet delight. Our perfectly baked crust is layered with a rich, creamy sauce and topped with tender, thinly sliced potatoes, seasoned to perfection. The addition of melted cheese adds a luscious, gooey texture, while a touch of herbs and spices brings out the savory depth of the potatoes.

item.name: Egg Pizza
item.description: Elevate your pizza experience with our Egg Pizza—a delightful fusion of breakfast and dinner. Our artisan crust serves as the perfect base, topped with a rich, savory tomato sauce and a generous layer of melted cheese. The star of the show is a perfectly cooked egg, nestled right in the center, with its yolk adding a creamy, golden touch to each slice.

item.name: Onion and Tomato Pizza
item.description: Experience the perfect harmony of flavors with our Onion and Tomato Pizza. Our crisp, golden crust is generously topped with a rich, zesty tomato sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. Slices of sweet, caramelized onions add a touch of savory sweetness, while ripe, juicy tomatoes provide a burst of freshness and tang.

item.name: Mushroom Pizza
item.description: Indulge in the rich, earthy flavors of our Mushroom Pizza, a true delight for mushroom lovers. Our perfectly baked crust is topped with a savory tomato sauce and a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese.

item.name: Olive Pizza
item.description: Discover a taste of Mediterranean delight with our Olive Pizza. Our perfectly baked crust is topped with a savory tomato sauce and a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese, creating a rich, cheesy base.
